detail_desc: Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.

Sandals in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with covered wedge heels. Open toes and a foot strap at the front, an ankle-height shaft with an open section at the back and a wide ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm. Heel 8 cm.

Clutch bag in glittery imitation leather with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow, detachable imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x27 cm.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, patch front pockets, shoulder pads, and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Knitted cashmere scarf with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x170 cm.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a text print on the front. UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand or product.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Ribbed front edges and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons.
Jumper in a soft slub cotton knit with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Two pairs of fully lined bikini bottoms, one with an all-over print and a frill-trim at the top.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a covered metal ring at the front of the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a concealed drawstring at the waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Size 25x170 cm.
Tunic in woven fabric with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Airy tunic in crisp pima cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck opening with narrow ties, and a double-layered yoke with a hanger and gathered seam at the back. Long, voluminous sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit and narrow ties, discreet pockets in the side seams lined with Tencel™ lyocell and a rounded hem.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Calf-length dress in a cotton crêpe weave with a square neckline and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and around the hems, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Waist-high hipster briefs in lace with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired jersey bra with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and no fasteners. Lined.
Tube scarf in woven fabric.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Flatlock seams around the neckline and hem.

Sturdy shoulder bag with a metal decoration on the flap, concealed magnetic fastener under the flap and a detachable shoulder strap with metal chains at the ends. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x14x17 cm.
Short swim top with long sleeves.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Set with a blouse and pair of shorts in an airy, printed viscose weave. Blouse with elastication and decorative gathers around the neckline, and cap sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication and frill-trims at the hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Short dress in a soft linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves and a tapered waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a T-shirt and dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on each shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Dungaree shorts in an airy weave with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined at the top.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Smartphone case in frosted, semi-transparent plastic.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave. Regular waist with smocking and a drawstring, and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Lined.
Top in cotton piqué with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave containing glittery threads. Narrow cut at the top with straight, gentle draping, a high collar, gathers down the front and ties at the neck. Deep V-neck at the back and a seam at the hem with a flared skirt and slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Lined bodice.
Long-sleeved top in an airy, rib-knit viscose blend. Open back with a twisted detail.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated trim at the top. Wide, embroidered flounce at the top with a scalloped edge. Elasticated hem.
Matching bracelets in soft fabric for best friends to share.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.

Straight-cut dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a drawstring and small frill trim around the neckline and an opening at the top. Wide, raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim. Wide, elasticated flounce at the top with embroidery on the front. Unlined.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Cropped top in crinkled viscose with crocheted shoulder straps and crocheted trims at the top and front. Buttons down the front and narrow elastication at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Shirt dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, button placket and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Dress in stretch jersey with a motif on the front with glittery details, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and a satin-lined tulle skirt with asymmetric tiers.

Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in stretch twill with an off-centre zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Zipped side pockets and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Short, straight-cut jacket in a sturdy, textured weave with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking at the top and long sleeves with two, bell-shaped flounces. Seam at the hem with a narrow frill and gently flared peplum. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups, a frill at the front and along the shoulder straps, and an adjustable metal hook fastening.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric in a jacquard pattern with a racer back. Seamless.
Dress in a soft rib knit with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and slits in the sides.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets, flap leg and back pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Ankle-length trousers in airy denim. High, elasticated waist with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Metal earrings with a clip at the top and post at the bottom. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, adjustable multiway spaghetti straps and a wide elastic trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, seam at the waist and a skirt in double-layered tulle, the top layer with an all-over print.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with embroidery, hard-worn details and a zip fly and button. Cut-off, raw-edge hems.

Suede boots with concealed wedge heels on the inside, a high shaft with loops on either side and decorative straps around the ankle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel (including concealed wedge) 5 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
